channel.title: Gateway with Debian Workstation
channel.description:
Hello there,i managed to configure debian vm working with gateway,and no connection,already followed this wiki
https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Ubuntu https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Other_Operating_Systems
and these links
https://moneroexamples.github.io/xubuntu-vm-through-whonix-gateway/ https://scottlinux.com/2015/09/01/use-kali-linux-through-tor-with-whonix-gateway/
Does workstation need some extra configs? Thanks

Ego this is actually not related to the topic.
Please personal experience only,if can.

I think vm need torsocks,is that true?

Read full topic

item.title: Gateway with Debian Workstation
item.dc:creator: Ego
item.description:
Good day,

As far as I’m aware (though my knowledge on KVM is limited), to use a custom workstation with KVM you’d have to apply special Whonix specific network templates which is explained here: https://www.whonix.org/wiki/KVM#Importing_Whonix_VM_Templates

You may already have noticed it, but each and every guide you linked only deals with custom Workstations on VirtualBox, not KVM.

Have a nice day,

Ego

Read full topic

item.title: Gateway with Debian Workstation

item.description:
Ego,sure KVM,just add whonix network in virt-manager,inside debian vm settings listed in links above

item.description:
Hello there,i managed to configure debian vm working with gateway,and no connection,already followed this wiki

Whonix

Ubuntu

Anonymous Ubuntu. Tunnel Ubuntu through the Tor Anonymity Network using Whonix.


Whonix

Other Operating Systems

Anonymize any Operating System! Your operating system tunneled through the Tor Anonymity Network! Create your Custom-Whonix-Workstation!

and these links

https://moneroexamples.github.io/xubuntu-vm-through-whonix-gateway/
https://scottlinux.com/2015/09/01/use-kali-linux-through-tor-with-whonix-gateway/

Does workstation need some extra configs?
Thanks
